more.title: US Embassy Confirms It’s Shutting Down Lifesaving HIV, TB, And Malaria Programs After Zimbabwe Rejects US$367M Deal
more.description: The United States Embassy has confirmed it is pulling the plug on lifesaving health programs in Zimbabwe, including HIV/AIDS treatment, tuberculosis control, and malaria prevention, after President Emmerson Mnangagwa rejected a massive US$367 million (approximately R6.8 billion) funding deal over sovereignty concerns.
